overview:
Rassami HÃ¶k Ljungberg is head of rassami, the communications consultants specialising in B2B corporate communications. Rassami has over ten years experience of in-house corporate and marketing communications strategy and tactics in a wide variety of professional services (B2B) industries such as High tech, Digital (Razorfish), Branded content(Stream/TBWA), Publishing (Asia Inflight â€“ Ringier) and Logistics (BTL-Schenker).

Key strengths include corporate communications, strategy development and implementation, e.g. brand positioning and building, core messaging, media relations and strategic PR.

Rassami has a range of international experience and is well-versed in communicating to diverse audiences from different cultures. Her strong cross-cultural communication skills are the result of having worked in international groups (Swedish, Swiss/French, American, Indian and British) and across a wide range of markets (Europe, Asia, India and Scandinavia).
